Reference

Top-level fitting functions

Main functions for simulating, sampling and inferring an SBM with missing data

simulateSBM()

Simulatation of a Stochastic Block Model

sampleNetwork()

Sampling of a network data set

is.missSBMcollection() ICL() optimizationStatus() getBestModel() missSBM()

An R package for adjusting Stochastic Block Models from networks data sampled under various missing data conditions

Classes of object fit

Description of the classes of objects used in missSBM to manipulate network data, model and sampling design.

missingSBM_fit

R6 Class definition of an SBM-fit

SBM_fit

R6 Class definition of an SBM-fit

SBM_sampler

An R6 Class to represent a sampler for a SBM

sampledNetwork

An R6 Class to represent a sampler for a SBM

networkSampler

Definition of R6 Class 'networkSampling_sampler'

networkSampling

definition of R6 Class 'networkSampling'

Data set

ESR1

ESR ego centred network
